ARTICLE.TITLE: United Arab Emirate strongly condemns terrorist attack in Kabul
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Sep 07, 2019 , 9:08AM United Arab Emirate strongly condemns terrorist attack in Kabul AIR United Arab Emirate has strongly condemned the terrorist attack that targeted Shash Darak district in the Afghan capital, Kabul and resulted in several deaths and injuries.



The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation said in a statement said that the attack, the second one to take place this week, for which the Taliban has claimed responsibility, represents an unacceptable escalation of violence and a heinous terrorist act against civilians and their families. The Ministry renewed the UAE's firm position against terrorism that must be rejected and combatted by all civilized nations.
